clinicalSignificance.comment: The frameshift variant NM_000277.3(PAH):c.919del (p.Gly307AlafsTer34) occurs in exon 9 of 13 and is predicted to result in NMD. The variant is absent from population databases, including gnomAD. One patient has been reported (PMID: 23430918) with this variant. In summary, this variant meets criteria to be classified as Pathogenic for PAH. PAH-specific ACMG/AMP criteria applied: PVS1, PM2, PP4.
